text: aaj tamaam paakeeza cheejen tumhaare lie halaal kar dee gayee hain aur ahale kitaab kee khushk cheejen gehoon (vagairah) tumhaare lie halaal hain aur tumhaaree khushk cheejen gehoon (vagairah) unake lie halaal hain aur aazaad paak daaman auraten aur un logon mein kee aazaad paak daaman auraten jinako tumase pahale kitaab dee ja chukee hai jab tum unako unake mehar de do (aur) paak daaminee ka iraada karo na to khullam khulla zinaakaaree ka aur na choree chhipe se aashanaee ka aur jis shakhs ne eemaan se inkaar kiya to usaka sab kiya (dhara) akaarat ho gaya aur (tulf to ye hai ki) aakherat mein bhee vahee ghaate mein rahega
